question_detail: Query the names of all students and their year of birth.
Query the student information of "physics" College and "history" college.
answer: select * from student where dept_name in ('Physics','History')

question_detail: Query the detailed records of all students.
Query the names and departments of all students.
Query all student information of "geography" college with a secondary school score of no more than 50 (you can use set or condition query).
answer: select * from student where dept_name = 'Geology' and tot_cred <= 50
